text: kya ve dharatee mein chale-phire nahin ki dekhate ki un logon ka kaisa parinaam hua, jo unase pahale guzar chuke hai? ve shakti aur dharatee mein apane chinhon kee drshti\ se unase kaheen badh-chadhakar the, phir unake gunaahon ke kaaran allaah ne unhen pakad liya. aur allaah se unhen bachaanevaala koee na hua
